description: Sets default sender ID on a configuration set. When sending a text message to a destination country that supports sender IDs, the default sender ID on the configuration set specified will be used if no dedicated origination phone numbers or registered sender IDs are available in your account.

parameters.name: ConfigurationSetName
parameters.description: The configuration set to updated with a new default SenderId. This field can be the ConsigurationSetName or ConfigurationSetArn.

parameters.name: SenderId
parameters.description: The current sender ID for the configuration set. When sending a text message to a destination country which supports SenderIds, the default sender ID on the configuration set specified on  SendTextMessage will be used if no dedicated origination phone numbers or registered SenderIds are available in your account, instead of a generic sender ID, such as --NOTICE'.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationSetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the updated configuration set.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationSetName
nested_items.description: The name of the configuration set that was updated.

nested_items.name: SenderId
nested_items.description: The default sender ID to set for the ConfigurationSet.
